miniapp.name: Warplet Connect
miniapp.description: Match pairs and clear the board in Warplet Connect.
miniapp.subtitle: A fun connect game inspired by Onet Classic
miniapp.tagline: Connect the tiles. Beat the clock.
miniapp.ogDescription: Test your focus and speed in Warplet Connect, a modern Onet-style matching game. Warplet is the Farcaster icon for fun and connection.
